1{-# OPTIONS_GHC -Wall #-}
2
3-- | Content expressions in relmap attributes.
4
5module Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Base.Get.Cox
6  ( -- * Content
7    getContent, getContents,
8    getFiller, getInt, getInteger,
9    getNamedContentTerms, getOptContentTerms,
10
11    -- * Content expression
12    getCox, getMaybeCox, getOptCox,
13    getCoxTerms, getNamedCoxTerms, getOptCoxTerms,
14
15    -- * Derived expression
16    getLet, getLetR,
17
18    -- * Portion
19    getPotionCount, getPotionCountR,
20    getPotionRatio, getPotionRatioR,
21  ) where
22
23import Prelude hiding (getContents)
24import qualified Koshucode.Baala.DataPlus          as K
25import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Core              as C
26import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Syntax.Pattern    as P
27import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Base.Get.Get  as Rop
28import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Base.Get.Rel  as Rop
29import qualified Koshucode.Baala.Rop.Base.Message  as Msg
30
31
32-- --------------------------------------------  Content
33
34-- | Get relmap parameter as calculated content.
35getContent :: (K.CContent c) => Rop.RopGet c c
36getContent med name =
37    do tree <- Rop.getTree med name
38       K.calcTree med tree
39
40-- | Get relmap parameter as list of calculated contents.
41getContents :: (K.CContent c) => Rop.RopGet [c] c
42getContents med name =
43    do trees <- Rop.getTrees med name
44       let trees2 = K.ttreeGroup <$> K.divideTreesByColon trees
45       K.calcTree med K.<#> trees2
46
47-- | Get relmap parameter as optional content.
48getOptContent :: (K.CContent c) => c -> Rop.RopGet c c
49getOptContent opt = Rop.getOpt opt getContent
50
51-- | Get relmap parameter as filler content, i.e., given content or empty.
52getFiller :: (K.CContent c) => Rop.RopGet c c
53getFiller = getOptContent K.empty
54
55-- | Get int content.
56getInt :: (K.CContent c) => Rop.RopGet Int c
57getInt med name = fromInteger <$> getInteger med name
58
59-- | Get integer content.
60getInteger :: (K.CContent c) => Rop.RopGet Integer c
61getInteger med name =
62    do dec <- K.getDec $ getContent med name
63       Right $ K.decimalNum dec
64
65-- | Get list of content terms.
66getNamedContentTerms :: (K.CContent c) => Rop.RopGet [K.Term c] c
67getNamedContentTerms = getOptContentTerms K.pTerm
68
69-- | Get list of content terms.
70getOptContentTerms :: (K.CContent c) => (K.TermName -> c) -> Rop.RopGet [K.Term c] c
71getOptContentTerms f med = optContentTerms f med K.#. Rop.getTreesTerms med
72
73-- | Build terms of content.
74optContentTerms :: (K.CContent c) => (K.TermName -> c) -> C.Intmed c -> [K.Term [K.Tree]] -> K.Ab [K.Term c]
75optContentTerms f = mapM . optContent f
76
77optContent :: (K.CContent c) => (K.TermName -> c) -> C.Intmed c -> K.Term [K.Tree] -> K.Ab (K.Term c)
78optContent f _   (n, []) = Right (n, f n)
79optContent _ med (n, ts) = do c <- K.calcTree med $ K.ttreeGroup ts
80                              Right (n, c)
81
82
83-- --------------------------------------------  Cox
84
85-- | Get required single content expression.
86getCox :: (K.CContent c) => Rop.RopGet (K.Cox c) c
87getCox med = buildCox med K.#. Rop.getTrees med
88
89-- | Get optional single content expression.
90getMaybeCox :: (K.CContent c) => Rop.RopGet (K.MaybeCox c) c
91getMaybeCox = Rop.getMaybe getCox
92
93-- | Get optional content expression with default content.
94getOptCox :: (K.CContent c) => c -> Rop.RopGet (K.Cox c) c
95getOptCox c = Rop.getOpt (K.coxLit c) getCox
96
97-- | Get list of content expression terms.
98--   Empty terms are filled with empty contents,
99--   e.g., __\/a__ __\/b__ /E/ is equivalent to __\/a__ () __\/b__ /E/.
100getCoxTerms :: (K.CContent c) => Rop.RopGet [K.TermCox c] c
101getCoxTerms = getOptCoxTerms $ const K.empty
102
103-- | Get list of content expression terms.
104--   Empty terms are filled with its term name.
105--   e.g., __\/a__ __\/b__ /E/ is equivalent to __\/a__ '\/a __\/b__ /E/.
106getNamedCoxTerms :: (K.CContent c) => Rop.RopGet [K.TermCox c] c
107getNamedCoxTerms = getOptCoxTerms K.pTerm
108
109-- | Get list of content expression terms.
110--   Contents of empty terms can be generated using its term name.
111getOptCoxTerms :: (K.CContent c) => (K.TermName -> c) -> Rop.RopGet [K.TermCox c] c
112getOptCoxTerms f med = optCoxTerms f med K.#. Rop.getTreesTerms med
113
114-- | Build content expression.
115buildCox :: (K.CContent c) => C.Intmed c -> [K.Tree] -> K.AbCox c
116buildCox med = K.treeCox (K.getCops med) . K.ttreeGroup
117
118optCox :: (K.CContent c) => (K.TermName -> c) -> C.Intmed c -> K.Term [K.Tree] -> K.Ab (K.TermCox c)
119optCox f _   (n, []) = Right (n, K.coxLit $ f n)
120optCox _ med (n, ts) = do cox <- buildCox med ts
121                          Right (n, cox)
122
123-- | Build terms of content expression.
124optCoxTerms :: (K.CContent c) => (K.TermName -> c) -> C.Intmed c -> [K.Term [K.Tree]] -> K.Ab [K.TermCox c]
125optCoxTerms f = mapM . optCox f
126
127
128-- --------------------------------------------  Let
129
130-- | Get @-let@ style parameter as set of derived functions.
131getLet :: (K.CContent c) => Rop.RopGet (K.CopSet c) c
132getLet med name =
133    do fs <- Rop.getOpt [] getLetBody med name
134       let cops = K.getCops med
135       Right $ cops { K.copsetDerived = fs }
136
137-- | 'getLet' with regular parameter name: @-let@.
138getLetR :: (K.CContent c) => Rop.RopGet0 (K.CopSet c) c
139getLetR med = getLet med "-let"
140
141getLetBody :: (K.CContent c) => Rop.RopGet [K.NamedCox c] c
142getLetBody med name =
143    do ts <- getLetTrees med name
144       getLetClause med K.<#> ts
145
146-- | Get trees delimited by vertical bar.
147getLetTrees :: Rop.RopGet [[K.Tree]] c
148getLetTrees = Rop.getWith (K.omit null . parse) where
149    parse [P.BSet ts] = K.divideTreesByBar ts
150    parse ts          = [ts]
151
152getLetClause :: (K.CContent c) => C.Intmed c -> [K.Tree] -> K.Ab (K.NamedCox c)
153getLetClause med ts =
154    Msg.abPara ts $ do
155      (lhs, rhs) <- treesEqDef ts
156      (n, vs)    <- getLetHead lhs
157      cox        <- buildCox med rhs
158      case vs of
159        [] -> Right (n, cox)
160        _  -> Right (n, K.coxForm ts (Just n) vs cox)
161
162getLetHead :: [K.Tree] -> K.Ab (String, [String])
163getLetHead [] = Msg.reqRawText
164getLetHead (n : vs) =
165    do n'  <- treeRawText n
166       vs' <- treeRawText K.<#> vs
167       Right (n', vs')
168
169-- | Extract definition form: /L/ = /R/
170treesEqDef :: [K.Tree] -> K.Ab (K.Twin [K.Tree])
171treesEqDef ts =
172    case K.divideTreesByEqual ts of
173      [lhs, rhs] -> Right (lhs, rhs)
174      _          -> Msg.abPara ts Msg.reqSingleEqual
175
176-- | Extract raw text from token tree.
177treeRawText :: K.Tree -> K.Ab String
178treeRawText (P.LRaw n) = Right n
179treeRawText t          = Msg.abPara t Msg.reqRawText
180
181
182-- --------------------------------------------  Portion
183
184-- | 'getPotionCount' with regular parameter names:
185--   @-order@, @-top@, @-mid@, and @-bot@.
186getPotionCountR :: (K.CContent c) => Rop.RopGet0 ([K.TermName], K.Portion) c
187getPotionCountR med = getPotionCount med "-order" "-top" "-mid" "-bot"
188
189-- | Get count-type portion parameter.
190getPotionCount :: (K.CContent c) => Rop.RopGet4 ([K.TermName], K.Portion) c
191getPotionCount med nOrder nTop nMid nBot =
192    do order <- Rop.getTerms med nOrder
193       top   <- Rop.getMaybe getInt med nTop
194       mid   <- Rop.getMaybe getInt med nMid
195       bot   <- Rop.getMaybe getInt med nBot
196       Right (order, K.def { K.portionTop    = top
197                           , K.portionMiddle = mid
198                           , K.portionBottom = bot })
199
200-- | 'getPotionRatio' with regular parameter names:
201--   @-order@, @-part@, and @-of@.
202getPotionRatioR :: (K.CContent c) => Rop.RopGet0 ([K.TermName], K.Portion) c
203getPotionRatioR med = getPotionRatio med "-order" "-part" "-of"
204
205-- | Get ratio-type portion parameter.
206getPotionRatio :: (K.CContent c) => Rop.RopGet3 ([K.TermName], K.Portion) c
207getPotionRatio med nOrderer nPart nOf =
208    do order <- Rop.getTerms med nOrderer
209       part  <- getInt med nPart
210       per   <- getInt med nOf
211       Right (order, K.def { K.portionParts = [part - 1]
212                           , K.portionPer   = Just per })
